action.content:
Aşakdaky meseläni ýerine ýetireliň. Maksat şuňa meňzeş boş seti doldurmak:

▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

Aşakda doldurylan gözenek 5-den 5-e çenli bolup biler we şeýle bolup biler:

▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ E ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X X X

Bu seti maňa ädimme-ädim suratlandyrmagyňyzy isleýärin. "▢" bilen görkezilen boş meýdançalary suratlandyrmagyň zerurlygy ýok. Diňe setdäki harplaryň ýerleşişini suratlandyryň. Soňra "Indiki buýrugyňyz näme?" Diýmegime garaşýarsyňyz, indiki ädimiňizi dowam etdirersiňiz. Buýruklar berlende gözenegiň ululygyny göz öňünde tutuň. Hemme zady suratlandyranyňyzda "BERILDI" diýýärsiňiz.

Aboveokardaky doldurylan gözenek üçin mysal ädimleri.

Indiki buýrugyňyz näme?
Buýruk: E-ni ikinji hatara üçünji sütüne goýuň

Indiki buýrugyňyz näme?
Buýruk: Iň soňky hatary X bilen dolduryň

Indiki buýrugyňyz näme?
Buýruk: BERILDI

Bolýar. Aşakdaky mysal üçin muny 5-den 5-e çenli gözenek bilen ýerine ýetirmegiňizi haýyş edýäris.
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
R ▢ R ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ R
R ▢ R R ▢
R ▢ R ▢ ▢
Indiki buýrugyňyz näme?

I understand that you want me to fill in the blanks in the given 5x5 grid, and the blanks can be filled with either a single character or a word. The characters in the grid should be arranged according to the instructions given. After each instruction, you will ask me "What is your next command?" and I will continue with the next instruction. Please keep in mind the size of the grid while giving the commands. Once all the blanks are filled, I will say
